# Every student...
![A GIF that rotates through words & finishes the sentence, "Every student... seen, heard, understood, known, supported."](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649a00faacdd32e494b33dd7_animation-every-student.gif)
Our easy and engaging student check-ins, personalized feedback, and built-in curriculum empower K-12 schools to improve student social, emotional, and academic well-being.
[Watch our demo](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)[Schedule a meeting](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<https:/calendly.com/sown-to-grow-demo-meetings>)
![An illustration of a teacher with long brown hair drawing a magical wave that her students are exploring. Inside the water there are green chalk illustrations that show growth and exploration, including a light bulb, a smiling face, an upward arrow, gears, and stars. The students are helping to draw this picture and one student stands on a ladder, writing "Next time I will..."](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/65a088c8edd8caf041eecc87_group-learning-2.svg)

# We believe in actionable student learning & support
A proactive way to support students & build scalable systems of care!
[Students share authentically and apply crucial life skills.](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Weekly check-ins invite students to share their current emotional well-being
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Rotating prompts to deepen reflection
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Engaging lessons are accessible & feel relevant to students' lives
![Sown To Grow Weekly Emotional Check-In. A screen that lets you select how you are feeling from 5 different emojis. Below it is a space for students to openly share how their week is going. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2324_infograph-students.gif)
[Teachers build connections and deepen relationships with students.](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Simple weekly routine that shows student trends
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Quickly provide personal responses to students (with feedback suggestions!)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Easy-to-teach curriculum made relevant to your grade level
[Learn More](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</roles/teachers>)![Teacher portal for reviewing student reflections. Teachers can see a list of student emojis and written reflections, then click in to give feedback.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2326_infograph-teachers.gif)
[Counselors and social workers proactively support students who are struggling.](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Real-time understanding of student emotional well-being (Tier 1)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Identify students for Tier 2 & 3 interventions as part of your student support system (MTSS)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
E-mail alerts for students who may need immediate intervention
[Learn More](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</roles/counselors-and-social-workers>)![School leader concerning reflection alert portal. School leaders can see a list of student reflections that were flagged by the system for concerning language and tone. They can click in to review and address these alerts.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2325_infograph-counselors.gif)
[School leaders get insights to create safe and supportive learning environments.](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Understand student well-being week over week
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Enhance staff capacity to build connection with students through comprehensive SEL practices
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Equip student support team with real-time data to proactively address student needs
[Learn More](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</roles/school-leaders>)![District leader data dashboards. There are two graphs. One is a line chart that shows emotions going up and down over time. The other is a bar graph showing pre/post SEL assessment growth.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2328_infograph-school-leaders.gif)
[District leaders use data to build, measure, and grow student support systems (MTSS).](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<#>)
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Live dashboard of well-being insights for the district and individual schools
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Measure progress in student SEL competencies
![A right-pointing arrow in green.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649b44ce0d18a2a39caf9fad_arrow_forward.svg)
Identify and scale best practices across schools
[Learn More](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</roles/district-leaders>)![School leader data dashboards. There are three graphs. One is a dial that shows the average emotion level of students in the school at that time. One is a line chart that shows emotions going up and down over time. The final one is list of student reflections that were flagged as concerning.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2327_infograph-district-admin.gif)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2325_infograph-counselors.gif)
![School leader data dashboards. There are three graphs. One is a dial that shows the average emotion level of students in the school at that time. One is a line chart that shows emotions going up and down over time. The final one is list of student reflections that were flagged as concerning.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2327_infograph-district-admin.gif)

The other is a bar graph showing pre/post SEL assessment growth.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649c563d2430731b4f6b2328_infograph-school-leaders.gif)
# Our impact
![A map of the United states illustrated in yellow with green chalk accents of stars and plus signs throughout.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649a5a2fe6acae6bc3609bfd_infograph-us-map%201.svg)
Supporting districts and schools across 40 states, and growing every day.
![An illustration of a South Asian girl with pigtails and a green and purple outfit sits in a wheelchair with a computer on her lap.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658373b39f69409a856bd3c0_infograph-student-laptop-wheelchair%201.svg)
Students were 22% more likely to often share their thoughts, feelings, & emotions with teachers.
![An illustration of a teacher with red hair grading student work. She sits next to a stack of books and an apple. There are green chalk stars drawn around her.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658373b3f9c6f36b14ec1c2e_infograph-teacher-lesson-plan.svg)
85% of teachers felt Sown To Grow helped them deliver more consistent & higher quality feedback to support their students.
![An illustration of a Black female student sitting at her desk in school, listening. She is wearing a green headband and yellow jacket. There are green chalk stars drawn around her.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/649a5a2f888866b68728db18_student-waiting.svg)
Students demonstrated growth in self-awareness, self-regulation, self-efficacy, & perseverance.
[Read more about our research](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</research-and-impact>)
# Districts we are proud to serve
![The Oakland Unified School District logo featuring the district name to the right of a light green tree in a circle with the yellow text 'every student thrives" wrapped around it](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9b280aee5d7033717266d_OUSD.png)![The North Shore District 112 logo with a blue circle containing the district name around a sketch of a light house on a white background](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9b2f658652c3ccb8921dd_North%20Shore.png)![The Metro Nashville Public Schools logo featuring the name of the district to the right of an illustrated student in a graduation cap with their arms raised in celebration coming out of a book in blue and yellow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c3fed1684380f8ca697c_MNPS.png)![The Lancaster School District Logo featuring a blue circle emblem with a desert mountain scene in the background and a gold band going across the center with the district name printed on it in a blocky font.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9caf51ecfcd22a08fe4bb_lancaster.png)
![The Hayward Unified School District logo of a white block H surrounded by a yellow half circle on top and a blue half circle on bottom](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c58f4d2e18f9c8cb2954_hayward.png)![Capistrano Unified School District logo featuring the district name in blue and a yellow bird and sunburst accent.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658376a188ef975db23af976_capistrano%20unified%20school%20district.png)![The Pajaro Valley Unified School District logo featuring a red apple sitting on a book with the background of shadow blue fields and a yellow half circle sun peaking out](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c4e504f992478facb29d_PVUSD.png)![Newton Public Schools logo with the district name in black text and three leaves in different shades of green growing from a berry on the left](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9caaa932537269907817f_Newton.png)
![The Delano Union School District Logo, featuring the district name in blue with a blue book and a sunrise bursting from the book above the district name](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c5524bf6f7123e563ed5_Delano%20Union%20Logo.png)![The New York City Department of Education Logo featuring NYC written in chunky block letters in green, orange, and blue respectively](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c458a26987414219112e_NYC_DOE.png)![Stockton Unified School District Logo featuring the district name in blue and orange with swirling embellishments.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658377cc2a7f1533fd51b34d_Stockton%20logo.png)![Lynwood Unified School District Logo featuring the district name under a graduation cap and two hands shaking in blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/6583781552b3fedd0c2313da_Lynwood%20Unified.gif)
![The Oakland Unified School District logo featuring the district name to the right of a light green tree in a circle with the yellow text 'every student thrives" wrapped around it](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9b280aee5d7033717266d_OUSD.png)![The North Shore District 112 logo with a blue circle containing the district name around a sketch of a light house on a white background](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9b2f658652c3ccb8921dd_North%20Shore.png)
![The Metro Nashville Public Schools logo featuring the name of the district to the right of an illustrated student in a graduation cap with their arms raised in celebration coming out of a book in blue and yellow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c3fed1684380f8ca697c_MNPS.png)![The Lancaster School District Logo featuring a blue circle emblem with a desert mountain scene in the background and a gold band going across the center with the district name printed on it in a blocky font.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9caf51ecfcd22a08fe4bb_lancaster.png)
![The Hayward Unified School District logo of a white block H surrounded by a yellow half circle on top and a blue half circle on bottom](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c58f4d2e18f9c8cb2954_hayward.png)![Capistrano Unified School District logo featuring the district name in blue and a yellow bird and sunburst accent.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658376a188ef975db23af976_capistrano%20unified%20school%20district.png)
![The Pajaro Valley Unified School District logo featuring a red apple sitting on a book with the background of shadow blue fields and a yellow half circle sun peaking out](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c4e504f992478facb29d_PVUSD.png)![Newton Public Schools logo with the district name in black text and three leaves in different shades of green growing from a berry on the left](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9caaa932537269907817f_Newton.png)
![The Delano Union School District Logo, featuring the district name in blue with a blue book and a sunrise bursting from the book above the district name](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c5524bf6f7123e563ed5_Delano%20Union%20Logo.png)![The New York City Department of Education Logo featuring NYC written in chunky block letters in green, orange, and blue respectively](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9c458a26987414219112e_NYC_DOE.png)
![Stockton Unified School District Logo featuring the district name in blue and orange with swirling embellishments.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/658377cc2a7f1533fd51b34d_Stockton%20logo.png)![Lynwood Unified School District Logo featuring the district name under a graduation cap and two hands shaking in blue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/6583781552b3fedd0c2313da_Lynwood%20Unified.gif)
"I think having a student voice is important. Having my teacher be able to support me,**I noticed a lot more motivation in my work and being able to use more tools** to help me in my assignments and being more comfortable at school."
![Illustrated avatar of a nonbinary teen with dark hair, pierced ears, and a dark T-shirt on an orange circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9d8f761248ee06b0f8291_student-high-school-3.svg)
**High School Student _‍_** _Summer School Program_ _‍_ Hayward USD
"Sown to Grow has given our district the**ability to look at the overall mental health of the students in our district from THEIR perspective.** As adults in the system, we are not always in tune with what makes a student happy or affects them in a negative way."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with brown straight hair and pale skin, gold earrings, and a navy blouse on a blue circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9d3f8fd0e7309f1d998aa_teacher-boskamp.svg)
**Lisa Aguerria** _Assistant Superintendent_ _‍_ Pajaro Valley USD
"On Sown To Grow I talk about how I’m feeling, how my week has been. And I’m**given a space to share what I’m going through.** I’m not kept in a box. I can talk about anything I want, but the question helps me formulate my thoughts."
![Illustrated avatar of a black boy with dark curly hair and a purple and white hoodie on a yellow circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9d96a625f2952f2f5e1e5_student-high-school.svg)
**Student Board Member‍** _High School_ _‍_ Metro Nashville PS
"This is **truly the best data we have ever had** in regard to the ongoing emotional health, well-being, and SEL capacity of our students. Sown To Grow allowed us to challenge our bias in looking at who is in need. Not just who we think is in need, but who is actually in need."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with short brown hair and pale skin, glasses, gold hoop earrings, and a white blouse with a red collar on a green circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9d0adac0eced0915a4ddd_teacher-barbara.svg)
**Barbara McClung** _Director, Behavioral Health_ _‍_ Oakland USD
"In counseling, we have our high flyers, but not every student feels comfortable coming to my office. **This is a great way to connect with those kids who would rather communicate in writing.** And then I can strategically make connections in person with them."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with brown straight hair and pale skin, gold earrings, and a navy blouse on a blue circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9d3f8fd0e7309f1d998aa_teacher-boskamp.svg)
**Ms. Boskamp** ‍ _High School Counselor_ _‍_ St. Louis Public Schools
"We’ve found that**SEL curriculum alone is necessary but not sufficient in proactively supporting the SEL needs of our students.** We see that curriculum coupled with an easy and engaging check-in process is by far the most powerful."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with blond hair and pale skin, a pearl necklace, and an orange blouse on a blue circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9dcaef4d26209b0229c59_teacher-keri.svg)
**Keri Applegate** ‍ _Director, Student & Family Engagement_ _‍_ Central School District
"It’s changed our culture. It used to be that if a student’s behavior or mood was off, the teacher would just refer them to the social worker, but now that they’re doing the check-ins,**it gives the teacher more context and starts to build that relationship** so that they can be the first line of defense."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with dark curly hair and a lavender blouse on a purple circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9da6afc0d81a4f6f7d22a_teacher-thomas.svg)
**Ms. Thomas** _Middle School Social Worker_ _‍_ North Shore District 112
"The privacy of it gives them the comfort that they can speak freely to me if they want to, and they get to answer the question however they want.**It’s a different way for them to show me who they are and what they know.** Now they remind me every Tuesday to do our Sown To Grow!"
![Illustrated avatar of a black woman with short curly hair, gold hoop earrings, and a green blouse on a green circle background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9daf524903e24d5fbf14b_teacher-ozier.svg)
**Ms. Ozier** ‍ _Elementary Teacher_ _‍_ St. Louis Public Schools

# Designed with your school's success in mind
![An overview of the SEL Curriculum. A Black male teacher standing at a white board with a lesson on Self-Awareness on it. There are waves of green and accent marks in green chalk in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9a3db6513f4a39805c7b2_infograph-curriculum%20.svg)
Research-aligned curriculum
CASEL- & ASCA-aligned curriculum offers developmentally appropriate, interactive lessons for each grade level (K-12) that can be taught in approximately 20 minutes.
[Request an overview of our curriculum](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1uDKPLIjCSa20vCH_gLXd_Q4j5mx>)
![Two bar charts showing pre/post results from the student social emotional learning assessment. The right bar chart shows higher results, indicating growth. There are waves of green and accent marks in green chalk in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9a68b29353fbee10af798_infograph-SEL-growth.svg)
Universal screener & growth monitoring
Student pre / post surveys help students understand their strengths, and empower staff to address opportunities for growth. We offer an accessible K-2 version so all students can participate.
[Request an overview of our survey](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<https:/share.hsforms.com/1d2GtPhX9TIeBD0rgia61PQ4j5mx>)
![An illustration of a woman in a hijab sits at a computer. She talks to a woman with short black hair, wearing a Sown To Grow green T-shirt, who is inside a circle portal to indicate an online conversation. There are waves of green and accent marks in green chalk in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9a69886fa39de172ebce2_infograph-flexible-PD.svg)
Flexible PD & in-platform feedback suggestions
In-platform student feedback tips and professional development help schools build proactive MTSS and culture rooted caring relationships.
[Access an overview of our PD approach](http://www.sowntogrow.com/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/1ASJ0Asypnm7ysuZ-a3sNFet-S796DCBQ/view?usp=sharing>)
![An illustrated list showing students that were flagged for further support because they shared multiple weeks of negative reflections in a row. There are waves of green and accent marks in green chalk in the background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64936e218f4d8f4941fe9d31/64c9a6a58bb8a3d6cb2fc7ae_infograph-tech-impact.svg)
Technology for impact
Our system (developed with the US DOE & National Science Foundation) flags students that may need elevated support so that educators can quickly respond.
[Learn more about our technology](http://www.sowntogrow.com/</technology>)

**High School Student _‍_** _Summer School Program_ _‍_ Hayward USD

**Lisa Aguerria** _Assistant Superintendent_ _‍_ Pajaro Valley USD
"On Sown To Grow I talk about how I’m feeling, how my week has been. And I’m**given a space to share what I’m going through.** I’m not kept in a box. I can talk about anything I want, but the question helps me formulate my thoughts."
![Illustrated avatar of a black boy with dark curly hair and a purple and white hoodie on a yellow circle background.⟨55⟩]
**Student Board Member‍** _High School_ _‍_ Metro Nashville PS
"This is **truly the best data we have ever had** in regard to the ongoing emotional health, well-being, and SEL capacity of our students. Sown To Grow allowed us to challenge our bias in looking at who is in need. Not just who we think is in need, but who is actually in need."
![Illustrated avatar of a woman with short brown hair and pale skin, glasses, gold hoop earrings, and a white blouse with a red collar on a green circle background.⟨56⟩]
**Barbara McClung** _Director, Behavioral Health_ _‍_ Oakland USD
"In counseling, we have our high flyers, but not every student feels comfortable coming to my office. **This is a great way to connect with those kids who would rather communicate in writing.** And then I can strategically make connections in person with them."

**Ms. Boskamp** ‍ _High School Counselor_ _‍_ St. Louis Public Schools

# Designed with your school's success in mind
![An overview of the SEL Curriculum. A Black male teacher standing at a white board with a lesson on Self-Awareness on it. There are waves of green and accent marks in green chalk in the background.⟨64⟩]
Research-aligned curriculum
CASEL- & ASCA-aligned curriculum offers developmentally appropriate, interactive lessons for each grade level (K-12) that can be taught in approximately 20 minutes.
Request an overview of our curriculum⟨65⟩

Universal screener & growth monitoring
Student pre / post surveys help students understand their strengths, and empower staff to address opportunities for growth. We offer an accessible K-2 version so all students can participate.

### Sown To Grow Overview

**Founding & Team**  
Founded in 2015, Sown To Grow started its journey as a company committed to enhancing student emotional and academic well-being. Based in Oakland, CA, and part of Y Combinator's Batch IK12, the company has grown to a team of 16 employees.

**Mission**  
While the specific mission isn't explicitly stated here, Sown To Grow is evidently focused on fostering a supportive educational environment through social and emotional learning (SEL) for K-12 students.

**What They Do**  
Sown To Grow develops a digital platform that allows students to engage in regular emotional and academic check-ins. Their tools enable teachers and school leaders to receive real-time insights into student well-being, enhancing both academic performance and emotional health.

- **Key Offerings**:
    - **Emotional Check-Ins**: A system for students to express and reflect on their feelings weekly.
    - **Academic Check-Ins**: A mechanism for students to share their academic progress and challenges.
    - **SEL Curriculum & Assessment**: Research-backed teaching modules aimed at developing students' social and emotional skills.

**Impact and Reach**  
Sown To Grow currently supports schools across 40 states, assisting educators in building a more attentive and responsive learning environment. Notable impacts observed include:
  - A 22% increase in students frequently sharing their thoughts and feelings with teachers.
  - 85% of teachers reported that the platform improved the quality and consistency of their feedback to students.
  - Enhanced student growth in self-awareness, self-regulation, and perseverance.

**Partners and Recognition**  
Sown To Grow collaborates with notable organizations such as the US Department of Education and the National Science Foundation, highlighting its commitment to developing effective educational solutions. They have received multiple accolades for their innovative approach to educational technology.

**Website & Contact Information**  
For more detailed information and resources, visit [Sown To Grow's website](http://www.sowntogrow.com/). If you're interested in learning more or want to get involved, reaching out to their team is just a click away. 

In sum, Sown To Grow is dedicated to nurturing the emotional and academic lives of students, making it a vital asset in modern educational systems. As they continue to grow, their focus on data-driven insights and innovative SEL practices bodes well for transforming how schools support their students.
